## Percentage of negative/positive values

pos_samples = train_data['song_popularity'].value_counts()[1]
neg_samples = train_data['song_popularity'].value_counts()[0]

## Create all ZEROS prediction.

y_pred['song_popularity'] = 0
y_pred

print(f"accuracy score: {accuracy_score(y_true, y_pred)}")
print(f"roc score: {roc_auc_score(y_true, y_pred)}")
